matrix.vui
Class DisplayText

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.vui.DisplayText
public class DisplayText
extends java.lang.Object

This class displays a text string which may contains newline characters. It will properly align and highlight the text and draw it in a given rectangle.
